name: Capture One Settings File
summary: Learn about .COS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When image adjustments are made, Capture One saves a COS file that has the same name as the original image but with the added ".cos" extension. For example, if you make adjustments to myphoto.jpg, Capture One saves a myphoto.jpg.cos file. When final adjustments are made, you can process, or "bake," the settings and photo together into an output image with all adjustments applied.

description: Image settings file created by Capture One, a program used for editing and organizing digital photos; saves image adjustments (exposure, color temperature, white balance, etc.) and other nondestructive edits for a photo.
